examples: The department is responsible for regulating the insurance industry.
El departamento es responsable de regular la industria de seguros.
The activities of credit companies are regulated by law.
Las actividades de las empresas de crédito están reguladas por ley.
The government accepts whaling in principle as long as it is carefully regulated.
El gobierno acepta la caza de ballenas en principio siempre que esté cuidadosamente regulada.
It is up to the regulating authority to put the measures into effect.
Corresponde a la autoridad reguladora poner en práctica las medidas.
